description: This file defines API endpoints for location-based services using FastAPI. It includes routes for searching locations via text queries and reverse geocoding coordinates. It imports specific functions and models, sets up routing with prefix and tags, and handles external service calls with error handling.

methods.name: LocationSearchResponse search(q: str = Query(..., description="Search text, e.g., city or place name"))
methods.description: Asynchronous function to search locations by text query; raises HTTP errors on invalid input or downstream errors, returns a list of location items.

methods.name: ReverseGeocodeResponse reverse(lat: float = Query(..., description="Latitude"), lon: float = Query(..., description="Longitude"))
methods.description: Asynchronous function to reverse geocode coordinates; handles errors and returns a location result if available.

ctags.name: reverse
ctags.pattern: /^async def reverse(lat: float = Query(..., description="Latitude"), lon: float = Query(..., descr/
ctags.signature: (lat: float = Query(..., description="Latitude"), lon: float = Query(..., description="Longitude"))

ctags.name: search
ctags.pattern: /^async def search(q: str = Query(..., description="Search text, e.g., city or place name")) -> Lo/
ctags.signature: (q: str = Query(..., description="Search text, e.g., city or place name"))
